model.name: jsonpath
model.title: JsonPath
model.description: Evaluate a JsonPath expression against a JSON message body.
model.label: language,json

expression.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

resultType.description: Sets the class name of the result type (type from output)

suppressExceptions.description: Whether to suppress exceptions such as PathNotFoundException.

allowSimple.description: Whether to allow in inlined simple exceptions in the JsonPath expression

allowEasyPredicate.description: Whether to allow using the easy predicate parser to pre-parse predicates.

writeAsString.description: Whether to write the output of each row/element as a JSON String value instead of a Map/POJO value.

headerName.description: Name of header to use as input, instead of the message body

option.description: To configure additional options on json path. Multiple values can be separated by comma.

trim.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

id.description: Sets the id of this node
